roleset.name: encourage revolution

example.name: Viva la revolucion!
example.text: Mr. Jobs, co-founder of Apple Computer Inc., founded Next four years ago in the hopes of [*]fomenting a revolution in the way desktop computers are designed and used.
example.arg: Mr. Jobs, co-founder of Apple Computer Inc.,
a revolution in the way desktop computers are designed and used.

roleset.note: FOMENT-V NOTES: Frames file for 'foment' based on sentences in wsj. No Verbnet entry. (from foment.01-v predicate notes)
